description.value:
This ragged, mud-stained cape closes with a single black button engraved with a leering devil's face. When you @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Leap]{Leap}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.High Jump]{High Jump}, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Long Jump]{Long Jump} (or Vault, if you're Spring-Heeled Jack), you gain a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Hide]{Hide} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Sneak]{Sneak} until the start of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.xprpg.equipment-effects.Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape]{Effect: Jack's Tattered Cape}
